description: Extracts structured talking points from raw notes and dictations. Identifies distinct argumentative insights and organizes them into outline sections.
researcher_question: What distinct argumentative insights can be extracted from these notes?

extracted_points.section_id: string - which outline section this belongs to

meta.notes_coverage: string - how much of notes was captured

extraction.core_question: What distinct argumentative insights are in these notes?
extraction_steps: PARSE NOTES: Identify distinct thoughts and insights
ASSIGN SECTIONS: Determine appropriate section for each
extraction.special_instructions: Extract 3-10 distinct points depending on note density. Each must be one crisp sentence.
